original_text: But it shall be on the seventh day, that he shall shave all his hair off his head and his beard and his eyebrows, even all his hair he shall shave off: and he shall wash his clothes, also he shall wash his flesh in water, and he shall be clean.
korean_text: 일곱째 날에 그는 모든 털을 밀되 머리털과 수염과 눈썹을 다 밀고 그의 옷을 빨고 몸을 물에 씻을 것이라 그리하면 정하리라

sentences.original_text: But it shall be on the seventh day
that he shall shave all his hair off his head
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그의 머리의 모든 털을 깎을 것이며

sentences.original_text: even all his hair he shall shave off
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 모든 털을 다 깎아 버릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: and he shall wash his clothes
also he shall wash his flesh in water
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 그는 물로 자기 몸을 씻을 것이요
